# xshell

[![PyPi Version](http://img.shields.io/pypi/v/xshell.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/xshell/)


Run `xshell.embed()`, you can do anything, in the Interactive Console.
## Installation

```
$ pip3 install xshell
```

## Usage

Write this anywhere.
```
xshell.embed('Are you ready?')
```
